text:
:wave::skin-tone-5: Hi Everyone!
My name is Francis, and I’m a PM on the HubSpot calling team.
I’m looking for Developers who are currently using or have previously used the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/calling-sdk|Calling Extensions SDK>.  We’d love to hear your feedback:
• what do you like?
• what can be improved?
• what new features would you like to see? 
Feel free to drop comments in a thread below, or DM me and we can set-up a 30 min call. Thanks!

Hi Francis! Nice to see HubSpot improving this feature!

I’m not a developer, but used the Calling feature a few times and I tried to create a product connecting the HubSpot Calling Extensions SDK and another calling service for my company-only use (probably using Twilio).
My biggest challenge was that this extension just provide support for paid users (independently if my HubSpot portal is Enterprise or not). So we would need to pay a HubSpot user license and the third-party calling service just to use that.

In the end, we chose to use an external platform without any connection to CRM.

Thanks for the feedback Felipe.
If that barrier were removed, at a high level how would the integration have functioned?
• Would you imagine reps making calls from HubSpot directly
• Would they continue to use the 3rd party software but have the data sync with the CRM?

They should make calls from HubSpot directly, absolutely!

Just a few specific cases would still use a 3rd party software, like my Collection team that needs to make bulk calls via an automatic dialer. But this is a specific case and even for them we should at least sync the data with the CRM

Greetings, I hope my query regarding API usage can be answered here; there is zero documentation on the matter and an open forum post not yet answered. I am attempting to creating a HubDB table with a FOREIGN_ID Column type via cms/v3/hubdb/tables . There is no documentation available on how to do this; when I try to use the same format as exports, I can only achieve 400 (Foreigntableidmustbedefined)  as response.
please can someone guide me on proper usage, I have included an example request / response below.
`{`
  `"name": "table_name",`
  `"useForPages": false,`
  `"label": "Table label",`
  `"allowChildTables": false,`
  `"allowPublicApiAccess": false,`
  `"dynamicMetaTags": {},`
  `"enableChildTablePages": false,`
  `"columns": [`
    `{`
      `"name": "normal_column",`
      `"label": "Normal column",`
      `"width": 330,`
      `"type": "TEXT"`
    `},`
    `{`
      `"name": "foreign_column",`
      `"label": "Foreign Column",`
      `"foreignTableId": 5315350,`
      `"foreignColumnId": 1,`
      `"foreignIds": [`
        `{`
          `"name": "EXAMPLE_1",`
          `"id": "63100937357",`
          `"type": "foreignid"`
        `},`
        `{`
          `"name": "EXAMPLE_2",`
          `"id": "63100951149",`
          `"type": "foreignid"`
        `},`
        `{`
          `"name": "EXAMPLE_3",`
          `"id": "63100937361",`
          `"type": "foreignid"`
        `}`
      `],`
      `"type": "FOREIGN_ID"`
    `},`
  `]`
`}`
An example response
`Foreigntableidmustbedefined: {`
  `name='foreign_column',`
  `label=ForeignColumn,`
  `type=FOREIGN_ID,`
  `id=0,`
  `deleted=false,`
  `options=[],`
  `foreignTableId0,`
  `width=null`
`}`
